titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the King and Queen at White-Hall, on the 28th of December, 1690 by George Royse ... ; printed by the King's special command.
titleStmt.author: Royse, George, 1654 or 5-1708.

notesStmt.note: Half-title page reads: Dr. Royse's sermon preach'd before the King and Queen, December 28, 1690.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
